description: This file defines the AppState class, a state management class extending ChangeNotifier for Flutter, managing global UI state including theme mode, loading indicator, and navigation index.

classes.name: AppState
classes.description: A state management class holding global UI state, including theme mode, loading indicator, and navigation index, with methods to update state and notify listeners.

methods.name: toggleThemeMode
methods.description: Toggles theme mode between light and dark and notifies listeners.

methods.name: setThemeMode
methods.description: Sets theme mode explicitly and notifies listeners if changed.

methods.name: setGlobalLoading
methods.description: Sets the global loading indicator status and notifies listeners if changed.

methods.name: setSelectedNavIndex
methods.description: Updates the selected navigation index and notifies listeners if changed.
